home.name: Miki
home.description: I'm a developer who loves building scalable systems and AI applications, turning complex challenges into elegant solutions

interests.text: Experimenting with new recipes in the kitchen
Playing poker and practicing trading strategy

achievements: Developed and maintained data visualization platform with custom SQLite calculation engine for business analytics
Initiated and created tooling to migrate calculation engine DSL from JSON to YAML for improved maintainability and error prevention
Developed feedback collection and management platform for data and performance indicators
Conducted comparative analysis of vector database systems for optimal data retrieval and processing
Spinned-up infrastructure for ML model deployment in AWS from scratch
Designed data pipeline for a SPF malicious url detection system and ML model retraining
Developed and implemented company-wide metrics for tracking KPIs and ROI
Mentored team members on system design, code pipeline, and software engineering best practices
Designed location-based recommendation for Indeed search autocomplete
Migrated admin portal for payment channel promotions to shared service and deprecate legacy monolithic system
Resolved promotion race condition issue by implementing Redis lock mechanism
Developed promotion risk monitoring and management system that can send real-time alerts to stakeholders for overused promotion
Redesigned flight status back-end services to optimize provider calls and integrated with Airport API for improved data reliability
Optimized refund and reimbursements API from several minutes to below 29 seconds to meet AWS API Gateway timeout requirements
Led back-end load testing initiatives and socialized testing methodologies to other engineers for AWS infrastructure optimization
Successfully migrated services, databases, cache, and other infrastructure across multiple AWS accounts

university.name: Universitas Indonesia (UI)
achievements: Graduated Cum Laude with GPA 3.81/4.00
Selected as teaching assistants of Discrete Mathematics 1 & 2, Programming Foundations 1, and Advance Programming

publication.title: Minimal Explanations in ReLU-based Neural Network via Abduction
publication.conference: Proceedings of 2020 International Conference on Advanced Computer Science and Information System (ICACSIS)

activities: Head of Data Science at RISTEK
Data Science Staff at Compfest X

projects.title: Eatbuddy
achievements: Developed a restaurant discovery platform using AI-powered recommendations
Implemented vector embeddings to provide personalized food and restaurant suggestions based on user preferences
Integrated LLM capabilities to generate intelligent summaries of restaurant reviews and curate dish recommendations
Deployed scalable microservices architecture on a bare metal home server using Kubernetes and Docker

projects.title: zkBlackjack
achievements: Trustless, provably fair Blackjack game using Mina Protocol's zkNoid platform
Implemented zero-knowledge proofs to verify fair card shuffling and dealing without revealing card values
Developed a seamless web interface for anonymous gameplay with cryptographic proof of fairness
Awarded 2nd place in Mina Protocol's zkGaming track

projects.title: txtlang
achievements: Created a revolutionary programming language that enables coding using natural human language
Designed and implemented a compiler that translates natural language to multiple target languages including Go and Python
Built extensible architecture to support adding new target languages in the future
Developed comprehensive test suite and documentation to ensure reliability and ease of use

projects.title: KLEMM
achievements: Led backend development in a startup incubated by University of Indonesia
Architected and implemented complete backend system including RESTful APIs, microservices, and database design
Established robust CI/CD pipeline and infrastructure using Kubernetes, Docker, and Terraform
Optimized system performance and scalability through microservices architecture and caching strategies
